website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use, easy to clean juicer – perfect for the casual juicer.
pros: Comes apart quickly and easily, making cleaning a breeze
There are high and low speed options
The high speed works efficiently for chopped fruits and vegetables
The low speed is perfect for juicing your leafy greens
Our favorite part was the spout – it turns upwards so that the last few drops of juice don't fall out on your counter
cons: Has a hard time juicing whole, hard fruits and veggies

customer_reviews.title: Good but not that good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine and it will process many things. Problem is getting extra parts. If the strainer basket goes bad you may never get a replacement. I have gone to the product web site two or three times to order one and they never have one. Have submitted every time to be put on a notice list when they are available. It has already been a month and half and I have not received notice yet. This is however a good starter machine for those just getting in on juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Smoking/ smells like smoke after two weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product but had to return the it the first time after two weeks. Had an issue were it started smoking. I got a replacement. It becomes a bit messy if the juice doesnt flow properly through the "funnel hole." On arrival, noticed the red plastic bin was cracked but nothing major. This product did juice the fruits good however still a lot of plup. Recommend a fine strainer to catch large particles.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Don't think...just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I hate all if the pieces but that just makes it's easier to clean thoroughly. This was such a worthwhile purchase and makes juice very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia & Nehemiah Minor

customer_reviews.title: I can get to use Jack lalanne juicer for 20-30 bucks. And it. LOL Jeffrey mite last me a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: It's an average centrifugal juicer. Honestly I like the Jack lalanne juicer that I had before because the grinding wheel was wider and it was offset from the center of your fruit or vegetables. In other words the cutting wheel is wider offset from setter. This juicer it is center of the vegetable that you're trying to juice. It works fine on the outer edges but in the center it doesn't do anything. If it's offset a bit it does much better at grinding and juicing your veggies and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: JPL

customer_reviews.title: Very Best Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is perfect. Easy setup and easy clean. I can juice an entire bunch of celery at once due to the wide mouth. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: G. Susan Pope

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this, the fruit wouldn't extract right, ended up with a bin full of fruit. With allot of juice left in it. And the fruit and veggies was flying out at me as i was pushing it down. Took tons of fruit and veggies to make 1 drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like that the juicer is fully assembled in the box. Nothing to put together. I only needed to remove a piece of cardboard from the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pope

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this juicer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this juicer! Every juicer is a pain to clean but this one at least comes with a tool to make it easier!!! Haven’t had any issues at all with this juicer and have been using it several months! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lifestuckinbed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice centrifugal food processor and easy to use daily.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to clean (a little nonstick spray on the interior discharge parts helps) in processing fruits and soft vegetables. Be sure to take the time to clean throughly after each and every use. Hamilton Beach has an excellent warranty and support their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Vibrant Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great little juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The cleaning brush that comes with it makes clean up a breeze. And I appreciate the lid on the pitcher, it keeps the juice foam from getting poured into your glass.
customer_reviews.author: Meganomics

customer_reviews.title: had to return
customer_reviews.text: had to return it...after a few uses it started to overflow
customer_reviews.author: S. Barackman

customer_reviews.title: It was NOT like new. There was a chip out of it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was more than used. It was NOT like new. There was a chip out of it and it didn't come with ANY instructions. LIKE NEW ???? NO. It was really used and I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Portlander

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product for juicing and one of the easier juicers to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Swamp hog

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular use.
customer_reviews.text: Not for people who juice regularly or juice greens. Mine stopped working after less than 40 uses over several months and the motor burned out.
customer_reviews.author: Terem

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice upgrade from the previous Hamilton Beach juicers in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a different juicer, so it's hard to compare, but I don't consider it to be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Graves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer I just love it!!! I have done all kinds of juices and works great. It doesn't make any mess and it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A lot of juice! Very dry pulp
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is so simple to use and quick to clean
customer_reviews.author: JaninTexas

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Liked almost everything Room for improvement - 1. It didn't remove all the moisture. If I took a handful of fiber and squezzed it I get a few more drops. The centrifuge should be a bit more powerful 2. The plastic is not of great quality. Already started deteriorating. Good for use and throw - say a year like most products
customer_reviews.author: King of Everest

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Juicer works well and cleans easy. I am very satisfied with the machine and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: makes great juice
customer_reviews.text: works great. clean is easy. Directions say put a bag in the collection bend to collect waste. Good idea saves clean up time
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tribble

customer_reviews.title: This is a great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This juice is very very well! The pulp is extremely dry so you can tell all the juice has been extracted.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 star love love this product so amazing!!!!! Easy to clean and fast to juice
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: love juicing now
customer_reviews.text: I have never juiced before in my life but this thing is AmaZINGGGGGG. love juicing now.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Have used to juice celery and apples. Works excellent. The cleaning brush is a great tool that requires a little elbow grease but overall its use is beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Premium Juicer Machine, Big Mouth 3" Feed Chute, 2-Speed, Easy Clean, 850 Watts, BPA Free, Red and Stainless (67851) -Discontinued
product_meta.description: What's your favorite juice? Whether it's Orange, apple or carrot, enjoying a fresh glass has never been easier. With its large chute and powerful motor, The Hamilton Beach big mouth plus 2 speed juice Extractor makes quick work of fruits and vegetables with little prep time required. And with a six-ounce juice container, there is no need to stop every few seconds to empty the container. Just juice and pour. When you're done, cleanup is a snap. All the parts are dishwasher safe and a cleaning brush is included for use in the strainer basket. The Hamilton Beach big mouth plus 2 speed juice Extractor is easy to assemble and store, but why put it away? With attractive stainless steel accents and a compact design, It may become a favorite countertop accessory.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY, HOMEMADE JUICE IN SECONDS Juice a variety of fruits and vegetables Easy to assemble 40oz BPA-free pitcher with lid and froth separator
3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY FROM THE #1 SELLING JUICE EXTRACTOR BRAND* With access to US-based customer support
CUT STRAINER CLEANING TIME IN HALF Patent-pending Easy Sweep cleaning tool included
EXTRA-LARGE 3 INCH FEED CHUTE FITS WHOLE FOODS Fit a whole apple, a peeled orange or a handful of kale Less pre-cutting, and more continuous juicing
TWO SPEEDS FOR MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF JUICE 850 watts of power adjust from high to low power

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
